OtherPrize.Txt2: 现在投注可获得投注货币 100% DICE

RangeTip: You win if the number on the dice falls in your betting range.
InputCountTip:
· The number of single bets can not exceed your wallet balance.
· The maximum number of single bets can not exceed 10,000 TRX.
LuckyValueTip:
1. The lucky number is the number of times you lose in a row. The number will go back to 0 if you win or lose 6 times in a row.
2. If you lose, 10% of your betting amount will be added to the lucky pool. When you win or lose 6 times in a row, the amount of funds in the lucky pool will turn to 0.
3. When the lucky number hits 3, the current amount of funds in the lucky pool will be added to the prize pool as a reward;
when the lucky number hits 6, twice the amount of funds in the lucky pool will be added to the prize pool as a reward.

Rule.P1: 1. Make sure you have a TRON Chrome Wallet. Click and install TronLink Wallet.
Rule.P2: 2. Make sure there is a certain amount of TRX in it and TRX is the prerequisite to joining the game.
Rule.P3: 3. You can choose different betting ranges, and the corresponding winning rate, losing rate, and prize will change accordingly.
Rule.P4: 4. Set the betting amount, which is the amount of TRX you would like to bet.
Rule.P5: 5. Click on the 'Roll the Dice' button to start the game and the smart contract will generate a random number from 1 to 6.
Rule.P6: 6. If the number generated falls in your betting range, you win.
Rule.P7:
If you win, you will receive a certain amount of prize in your prize pool and the prize can be withdrawn to your wallet.
If you lose, you still have the opportunity to win the lucky prize.
Rule.RuleTip: Got questions? You are welcome to join our Telegram Group and we are more than happy to help you!

Service.P1: The website provides the smart contract page based on TRON blockchain. It will receive TRX and transfer different amount of TRX according to external factors.
Service.P2: We cannot verify the legitimacy of service in all areas of jurisdiction, neither can we provide any legal advice for you. Please follow the instructions above and obey the laws, policies, and regulations related to TRX usage in your area of jurisdiction. Please notice that you will take full responsibility for yourself.
Service.P3: Players may gain or lose TRX in games based on smart contracts. We do not bear any responsibility for the result of the game that we provide.
Service.P4: We reserve the right to modify the website, its services, and these terms without notice.

LoginTipTitle: Please log in to your TRON Chrome Wallet.
LoginTipContent: If you have not downloaded the wallet, please visit https://goo.gl/Yb4NRU and download the Chrome extensions.

BalanceNotEnough.Title: Insufficient wallet balance
BalanceNotEnough.Content: Please check your betting amount or withdraw the funds in the prize pool to your wallet.
